headline: 3 Are Suspended After Knicks-Grizzlies Spat
abstract: The league also fined Knicks forward Marcus Morris Sr., in part for comments he made after Wednesday’s game, saying a Memphis player had “female tendencies.”
lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. has disciplined five players, including Elfrid Payton and Marcus Morris Sr. of the Knicks, in connection with a scuffle near the end of a game against the Memphis Grizzlies on Wednesday night at Madison Square Garden.
